author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Delta Today Show to spotlight survivor flightTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Delta Today Show to spotlight survivor flight Published on : Thursday, October 1, 2015
NBC’s Today Show will run a segment on Friday highlighting Delta’s employee survivor flight as part of the network’s overall Breast Cancer Awareness Month coverage.
The segment will include a behind-the-scenes look at Delta’s updated pink plane livery as well as interviews with Delta employees and the festivities surrounding the “Breast Cancer One” charter flight.
The broadcast is scheduled to appear during the 8 a.m. ET hour on NBC.
Since 2005, Delta employees, customers and their friends and family members have raised $9.2 million for the Breast Cancer Research Foundation, including last year’s donation of $1.3 million. Their contributions have funded the vital work of 37 different research projects over the years in the pursuit of eradicating breast cancer.
Source:- Delta Air Lines
